dataset.name: SMHI-EC-EARTH EUPORIAS hindcast
dataset.documentation: Data downloaded from the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (SMHI) on 15/08/2015 and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).

The use of the SMHI-EC-EARTH EUPORIAS hindcast dataset is unrestricted for both commercial and non-commercial purposes. This dataset has been included in the EUPORIAS group of the User Data Gateway (UDG). Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset (http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki).

In publications that rely on this dataset, I will appropriately credit the data providers by an acknowledgement similar to the following: "The authors are grateful to SMHI for providing the SMHI-EC-EARTH EUPORIAS hindcast".

I acknowledge the potential limitations of the data obtained from this archive. These may include (but are not necessarily limited to) errors in the models, shortcomings in the experiment designs, and statistical uncertainty of model results. I understand that although the model output has been subjected to a quality control procedure, unrecognized errors almost certainly remain.
